title: I have found the real ELO Hell, and it has nothing to do with games that are below you being hard
body:
The real elo hell is when you end up in an MMR division much higher than you should be: IE, gold 5 but you're playing against plat 2 to gold 2, and are an outlier. But then the game also decides not to let you skip tiers so you can reach your implied MMR faster.

So now all of your games are a ton harder because the people you are playing are literally leagues above you, and even if you win you don't get to skip brackets? It's a sweet spot that feels like hell.
